    • Method Detail

      • encryptFileWithTripleDES

        public static void encryptFileWithTripleDES(java.lang.String filePath,
                                            HashingAlgorithm hashingAlgorithm,
                                            EncryptionType encType,
                                            java.lang.String password)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Encrypt a file

        WARNING : The encryption works with TripleDES combined with the HashingAlgorithm that you choose.
        When encrypt a file name with this method, the "/" characters of the hash will be automatically replaced with ",", and "\" with ";" because Windows doesn't accept file names with "/".
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path to the file
        hashingAlgorithm - Hashing algorithm used to encrypt file
        encType - Encryption type used (file content, file name, both)
        password - TripleDES encryption password
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown when file isn't found

      • decryptFileWithTripleDES

        public static void decryptFileWithTripleDES(java.lang.String filePath,
                                            HashingAlgorithm hashingAlgorithm,
                                            EncryptionType encType,
                                            java.lang.String password)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Decrypt a file

        WARNING : The encryption works with TripleDES combined with the HashingAlgorithm that you choose.
        When decrypt a file name with this method, the "," characters of the hash will be automatically restored with "/", and ";" with "\" because Windows doesn't accept file names with "/".
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path to the file
        hashingAlgorithm - Hashing algorithm used to encrypt file
        encType - Encryption type used (file content, file name, both)
        password - TripleDES encryption password
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown when file isn't found
